sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
pale
, ni močne ali izrazite barve.

seg.quote: He had on a pale blue shirt.
The house is built of pale stone.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
looks pale
, je njegov obraz bolj bel kot ponavadi, ker je bolan, prestrašen ali pretresen.

seg.quote: You look awfully pale: are you all right?
Symptoms are unusual paleness and tiredness.
